projects.name: DIV Hospitality | Resort Booking Website
projects.description: During my internship at Div Hospitality, I spearheaded the development of a full-stack website, surpassing previous attempts by utilizing my diverse skill set in programming languages. Employing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I created an engaging user interface, while integrating artificial intelligence techniques expedited development and enhanced functionality.

projects.name: Elegance
projects.description: I developed a Full Stack Website for the Salon and completely responsive which provide a major feature of booking slot in the salon and i tried to provide the users a aesthetic interface and a very user friendly experience.

experiences.description: Successfully built and launched a full-stack website for the company, using React and JavaScript for the frontend and MongoDB for the backend. Configured and maintained the MongoDB database for efficient data handling and storage, and integrated APIs to enhance functionality.

Successfully designed, developed, and deployed a full-stack website for the company, utilizing React, JavaScript, and MongoDB for both the frontend and backend. Set up and managed the database using MongoDB, ensuring efficient data handling and storage.

Cost Optimization and Efficiency : Automated the billing process, reducing manual errors and operational costs associated with ad publishing management. Enhanced Scalability : Delivered the project in record time, exceeding client expectations and demonstrating strong project management and technical skills.
